events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and are excited to move forward with the review.
The application has been categorised under Engineering as the candidate applied for the developer role, meeting the required skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to oversee the hiring process and communicate with the candidate.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development practices.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about proceeding to the technical interview stage of the recruitment process.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities with the engineering team.
The candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating excellent developer skills and a deep understanding of software architecture.
Following the successful technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate aligning with the company values and expressing excitement about joining the team.
An offer letter has been proposed to the candidate outlining the salary, benefits, and role responsibilities awaiting their review.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested a short period to consider the terms presented.
The candidate has accepted the job offer enthusiastically and is eager to start working with the engineering team.
Onboarding has officially started with the candidate completing all necessary documentation and attending orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated and actively contributing to engineering projects.
